question: 傍観
sourceMnemonic: <kanji>Nearby</kanji> there is a beautiful <kanji>view</kanji>. <vocabulary>Look on</vocabulary> as the sun sets and the sky changes color. You would give up anything to be able to <vocabulary>spectate</vocabulary> this kind of thing all the time.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
